Subroutine optsensitivity

506 : 
507 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
508 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
509 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
510 : ! ADDED BY STAN TO ASSESS SENSITIVITY OF OBJECTIVE FUNCTION TO EACH OPTIMISED
511 : ! PARAMETER:
512 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
513 : 
514 :       subroutine optsensitivity ()
515 :       use sce_mod
516 :       implicit none
517 : 
518 :       INTEGER :: i_, j_, failed10, pos
519 :       REAL*8  :: distmin, distmax, oldpar, newpar, ofvec2, ofchange, parchange
520 :       CHARACTER(300) :: writeformat
521 : 
522 :       shufflevar2(:) = shufflevar(:,1)
523 :       ofvec2 = ofvec(1)
524 :       failed10 = 0
525 : 
526 :       print *,"SENSITIVITY ANALYSIS"
527 :       print *,"(changes in % of feasible range)"
528 :       print *
529 :       write(kfile_progress,'("SENSITIVITY ANALYSIS"/"changes in % of feasible range)" )')
530 :       dataarray(1,1:nopt) = shufflevar2(optid(:))
531 :       dataarray(1,nopt+1) = ofvec2
532 :       evolution = 'test'
533 :       pos = 0
534 :       do i_ = 1, nopt
535 :         oldpar = shufflevar2(optid(i_))
536 : 
537 : !       * TO MAKE SURE THAT PERTURBATIONS DO NOT EXCEED THE FEASIBLE RANGE
538 : !       * AND THE PARAMETER VALUES THEMSELVES
539 : 
540 :         distmin = oldpar - parmin(optid(i_))
541 :         distmax = parmax(optid(i_)) - oldpar
542 :         writeformat = '(/"change of var: ",a9, "(",e9.3,")")'
543 :         write(*,writeformat) parname(optid(i_)), oldpar
544 :         write(kfile_progress,writeformat) parname(optid(i_)), oldpar
545 :         do j_ = 0, 3
546 :           newpar = oldpar - distmin * 10.d0 ** (-j_)
547 :           shufflevar2(optid(i_)) = newpar
548 :           nrun = nrun + 1
549 :           call transpmodel(shufflevar2(:), size(shufflevar2(:)), nrun, ofvec2, 1)
550 :           if (ofvec2 .gt. bestobj) then
551 :             bestobj = ofvec2
552 :             open(kfile_currentbest, file=sfile_currentbest(1:len_trim(sfile_currentbest)))
553 :             write(kfile_currentbest,outformat) shufflevar2(:), bestobj
554 :             close(kfile_currentbest)
555 :           endif
556 :           write(kfile_sceout,outformat) shufflevar2(optid(:)), ofvec2
557 :           dataarray((i_-1)*8+j_+2,1:nopt) = shufflevar2(optid(:))
558 :           dataarray((i_-1)*8+j_+2,nopt+1) = ofvec2
559 :           ofchange = (ofvec2 - dataarray(1,nopt + 1))               &
560 :      &             / abs(dataarray(1,nopt + 1)) * 100.d0
561 :           parchange = (newpar - oldpar) / (parmax(optid(i_))            &
562 :      &              - parmin(optid(i_))) * 100.d0  ! the change of the parameter in % of feasible range
563 :           writeformat = '(f6.3,"% (",f14.6,")",": change of OF by ",'
564 :           writeformat(44:66) = 'e9.3,"%"," (",e9.3,")")'
565 :           write(*,writeformat) parchange, newpar, ofchange, ofvec2
566 :           write(kfile_progress,writeformat) parchange, newpar, ofchange, ofvec2
567 :           if (ofchange .gt. 1.d-10) then
568 :             shufflevar(:,sopt-pos) = shufflevar2(:)
569 :             ofvec(sopt-pos) = ofvec2
570 :             pos = pos + 1
571 :             if (abs(parchange) .gt. resolution) then
572 :               failed10 = failed10 + 1
573 :             endif
574 :           endif
575 :         enddo
576 : 
577 :         do j_ = 3, 0, -1
578 :           newpar = oldpar + distmax * 10.d0 ** (-j_)
579 :           shufflevar2(optid(i_)) = newpar
580 :           nrun = nrun + 1
581 :           call transpmodel(shufflevar2(:), size(shufflevar2(:)), nrun, ofvec2, 1)
582 :           if (ofvec2 .gt. bestobj) then
583 :             bestobj = ofvec2
584 :             open(kfile_currentbest, file=sfile_currentbest(1:len_trim(sfile_currentbest)))
585 :             write(kfile_currentbest,outformat) shufflevar2(:), bestobj
586 :             close(kfile_currentbest)
587 :           endif
588 :           write(kfile_sceout,outformat) shufflevar2(optid(:)), ofvec2
589 :           dataarray((i_-1)*8+j_+6,1:nopt) = shufflevar2(optid(:))
590 :           dataarray((i_-1)*8+j_+6,nopt+1) = ofvec2
591 :           ofchange = (ofvec2 - dataarray(1,nopt + 1))               &
592 :      &             / abs(dataarray(1,nopt + 1)) * 100.d0
593 :           parchange = (newpar - oldpar) / (parmax(optid(i_))            &
594 :      &              - parmin(optid(i_))) * 100.d0  ! the change of the parameter in % of feasible range
595 :           write(*,writeformat) parchange, newpar, ofchange, ofvec2
596 :           write(kfile_progress,writeformat) parchange, newpar, ofchange, ofvec2
597 :           if (ofchange .gt. 1.0d-10) then
598 :             shufflevar(:,sopt-pos) = shufflevar2(:)
599 :             ofvec(sopt-pos) = ofvec2
600 :             pos = pos + 1
601 :             if (abs(parchange) .gt. resolution) then
602 :               failed10 = failed10 + 1
603 :             endif
604 :           endif
605 :         enddo
606 :         shufflevar2(optid(i_)) = oldpar
607 :       enddo
608 : 
609 : !     * ASSESS SECOND CONVERGENCE CRITERIUM: NO PARAMETER CHANGE BY MORE THAN
610 : !     * 10% LEADS TO AN INCREASE IN OBJECTIVE FUNCTION
611 : 
612 :       if (failed10 .gt. 0) then
613 :         writeformat = '(i2," parameter(s) more than ",f6.3,"% out of '
614 :         writeformat(47:84) = 'optimum."/"Optimisation continued...")'
615 :         write(*,writeformat) failed10, resolution
616 :         write(kfile_progress,writeformat) failed10, resolution
617 :       else
618 :         writeformat = '(//"Second convergence criterion satisfied:"/"'
619 :         writeformat(47:85) = 'no parameter shift by more than ",f6.3,'
620 :         writeformat(86:118) = '"% of max distance leads to"/"an '
621 :         writeformat(119:155) = 'increase in the objective function.")'
622 :         write(*,writeformat) resolution
623 :         write(kfile_progress,writeformat) resolution
624 :         success = 1
625 :       endif
626 : 
627 : !     * IF CRITERIUM NOT SATISFIED, APPEND NEWLY CREATED DATA TO THE END OF
628 : !     * shufflevar AND ofvec ARRAYS AND RETURN TO MAIN LOOP TO RE-RUN SCE-LOOP
629 : !     * --> deleted
630 : 
631 :       return
632 :       end subroutine optsensitivity
